attributes.action: to intervene in the the dispute witt royal mail
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Sir.
        I am employed with Royal Mail and work at Bolton Mail centre. Could you possably ensure that there will intervention,as this will lead to job losses, which in turn has aknock on effect for the economy

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
